Description: Come learn about the clinical utility of the Digital LightCycler dPCR System in oncology applications.  View data obtained from multiple customer sites to demonstrate this reliable system’s capabilities in the detection of Copy Number Variation, linear titration, and multiplexing.  Learn how the powerful, 6-channel Digital LightCycler dPCR System and 3 plate configurations can enable you to push the limits of precision, sensitivity, and flexibility in the detection of oncology-relevant targets.
SearchResultBody: ESP08B. Pushing the Boundaries of Precision, Sensitivity, and Flexibility in Oncology with Roche’s Digital LightCycler? dPCR System
Title: Pushing the Boundaries of Precision, Sensitivity, and Flexibility in Oncology with Roche’s Digital LightCycler? dPCR System
